When there are already few doujinshi on a character and the only ones available are rapes or stories of corruption and infidelity, it's normal that you want to break bricks on the heads of some people, to calm their little perverse minds. Especially when the character in question is one of the most respectable in the manga and would never stoop to such things. Nobody likes to see something he likes being slandered unfairly.
Bell, what point is there in getting stronger if you get cucked doing it?
GUYS DONT READ IT IF YOU DONT LIKE IT

Smake : No, it is you harmful hypocrites who deserve to die! Hedonists, debauchees with unscrupulous desires and whose quest for pleasure has no moral limits... Your happiness is summed up in your lousy libido and its unbridled sexuality which hardly knows temperance. Always rejoicing in the suffering of others, advocating vice, perversion or your sado and masochistic fantasies whose unhealthiness knows no equal. You who love so much to shamelessly degrade the image of characters who deserve respect or corrupt those around you for your own selfish benefits. You are only animals, demons without dignity or ethics who are not even worthy of being called human... But only the embodiment of the decay of this world, the dishonor of humanity and its weakness in the face of temptations. The sin of lust and pride in all its splendor. But no real pride or self-esteem... Enjoy your superficial and ephemeral happiness while you can, the indelible regrets will surely be felt when it is too late.

This is clearly not a decadent NTR... Just a disgusting rape. She's completely dead inside at the end... Plus it's not believable at all, she's the strongest woman in Orario and there's only one person who's more powerful than her, no one could ever rape her, especially with Loki familia behind. I'm sorry for the aggressors, they will suffer a fate worse than death with the goddess Loki and her familia. But it is well deserved ! You really have the soul of a sinner to imagine and draw this kind of fiction... I hope that if God exists, he will reserve a nice place for you in hell, where snakes like you deserve to go. It will teach you to make vulgar slander on respectable people.
NTR artists! Fuck you in hell!
